title: Minecraft 主机版 1.90 发布
author: Mithey
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mithey 于 2019-6-7 08:02 编辑 
主机版即PlayStation 4版和Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。
迎接新的正式版吧！
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
来源:
https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/minecraft-editions/minecraft-playstation-4-edition/mcps4-discussion/2230179-ps4-patch-change-logs
更新日志 -2019年4月15日Added Loom.添加织布机Added Lectern.添加讲台Added Lantern.添加灯笼Added Crossbow.添加弩Added Shields.添加盾牌Added Community Cat Skin.添加了社区选择的猫皮肤Added Pillagers (Creative Only)添加掠夺者(仅限创造)Added Banner stencils.添加旗帜横幅Added Wood Blocks (Bark).添加去皮的木头New Vanilla Textures.新的官方材质Added Minecraft Classic Texture Pack (Built in).内置了Minecraft经典材质Added 6 new Trophies.加入了六个新奖杯Added the Ability to create dyed stained glass and dyed carpets directly from glass pane/white carpet + dye.现在可以直接用玻璃(板)/白色地毯加上染料的方法来制作染色玻璃(板)/染色地毯Cats can now be healed by feeding them fish.给猫喂鱼时可以治疗它Chorus Fruit Flowers now break when struck via an Arrow.紫颂花被箭射时会爆炸了Creepers can drop Records if they are killed by a Stray.爬行者被流浪者击杀时也会掉落唱片了Dead Bush can be used a Furnace Fuel.枯萎的灌木可以被用作燃料Decaying Leaves can now drop Sticks occasionally.枯萎的树叶现在有几率掉落木棍Dispensers with Shears in them, will shear Sheep when activated.发射器可用于剪羊毛New Shapeless Recipes for Rabbit Stew and Beetroot Soup.兔肉煲和甜菜根汤可以无序合成了Placing wet sponge in Nether and Warm Biomes will dry it out after some time.湿海绵放置在地狱或是温暖的生物群系会变干





外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
